Have tons of labels? Rendering problems can arise when you have dozens of inline labels within a narrow container, each containing its own inline-block element (like an icon). The way around this is setting display: inline-block;. For context and an example, see #13219.Rendering problems can arise when you have dozens of inline labels within a narrow container, each containing its own inline-block element (like an icon).
